name: Dead Ghost
description:
This Game is a part of Gamedev.tv Game Jam 2022. I have created this game for the game jam. this is a third person shooter game, where you can play as Ghost, and kills other ghost, and try to survive as long as you can, and If you're dead when fighting with ghosts you can respawn and you will get an superpower for short time, this super power gives you more power and invinciblity. The more you complete the wave the more the enemy become stronger and tough.

In FInal Wave you have to Defeat a white ghost boss who is the toughest of them all.

Assets used while making this game are listed below-:

1. 3D Simple Building-Hotel - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/3d-simple-building-hotel-2...

2. 48 Particle Effect Pack - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/p/48-particle-effect-pack-13998

4.  Basic RPG Cursors - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/basic-rpg-cursors-13...

5. Crosshairs Plus - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/crosshairs-plus-139902

6. Halloween Cemetery Set - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/halloween-cemetery...

10. RPG/FPS Game Assets for PC/Mobile (Industrial Set v2.0) - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/industrial/rpg-fps-game-as...

11. Space SFX - 102218 - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/space-sfx-102218-131463

12. Ui button pack 6 - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/ui-button-pack-6-143159

13. Ultra Sci-Fi Game Audio Weapons Pack Vol. 1 - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/weapons/ultra-sci-fi-game-a...

14. War FX - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/war-fx-5669

15. Fire Ice Projectile - Explosion - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-ice-projectile-explosio...

Try out this game and Have fun..

Thank you,
